Area Status.name: Area Status
Area Status.description:
Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers (choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak).

  • Targets Suffers: @EFFECT[dazed], @EFFECT[shaken], @EFFECT[slow], or @EFFECT[weak]

Curse.name: Curse
Curse.description:
The target suffers (choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak).

  • Target Suffers: @EFFECT[dazed], @EFFECT[shaken], @EFFECT[slow], or @EFFECT[weak]

Curse XL.name: Curse XL
Curse XL.description:
The target suffers (choose two: dazed, shaken, slow, weak).

  • Target Suffers: @EFFECT[dazed], @EFFECT[shaken], @EFFECT[slow], or @EFFECT[weak]

Cursed Breath.name: Cursed Breath
Cursed Breath.description:
The target suffers 【HR + 15】 (choose type) damage and suffers (choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak).

  • Target Suffers: @EFFECT[dazed], @EFFECT[shaken], @EFFECT[slow], or @EFFECT[weak]

Devastation.name: Devastation
Devastation.description:
Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 (choose type) damage. You may only cast this spell once per turn.

This spell should only be given to champion and elite creatures level 30 or higher, and said creatures can only cast this spell during their last turn in the round.

  • Targets Suffer: @DMG[30 untyped]

Lick Wounds.name: Lick Wounds
Lick Wounds.description:
You recover 20 Hit Points. This amount increases to 30 Hit Points if you are level 20 or higher, to 40 Hit Points if you are level 40 or higher, or to 50 Hit Points if you are level 60 or higher.

  • You Recover: @GAIN[&step(20,30,40,50) hp]{20|30|40|50 HP}

Life Theft.name: Life Theft
Life Theft.description: The target suffers HR + 15 (choose type) damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.

Mind Theft.name: Mind Theft
Mind Theft.description: The target suffers HR + 15 (choose type) damage. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.

Poison.name: Poison
Poison.description: Each target hit by this spell suffers @EFFECT[poisoned].

Quicken.name: Quicken
Quicken.description: The target may immediately perform a free attack with a weapon they have equipped (or with a basic attack, if the target is an NPC).

Rage.name: Rage
Rage.description: Each target hit by this spell suffers @EFFECT[enraged].

Shell.name: Shell
Shell.description:
Until this spell ends, you gain Resistance to physical damage.

  • You Receive: @TYPE[affinity physical resistance e:eos i:1 t:source]

War Cry.name: War Cry
War Cry.description:
Until this spell ends, each target gains a +1 bonus to Accuracy Checks.

  • Targets Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.62RZnGQvUWIEyeJ7 e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: War Cry}

Weaken.name: Weaken
Weaken.description:
Until this spell ends, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal (choose type) damage.

  • Target Suffers: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.6JCfyn7Ewt0AJndC e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: Weaken (Physical)}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.aI4tsuVswH5gfGab e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: Weaken (Air)}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.MRNCMGIcZStGVV9J e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: Weaken (Bolt)}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.zFQpa3KcSAmBCWdE e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: Weaken (Dark)}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.YpXM5ClzMzIcwCgd e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: Weaken (Earth}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.dAFACJSQzCbcU9We e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: Weaken (Fire)}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.BVOW692emrw4yxR0 e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: Weaken (Ice)}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.aPBdnNy1hA8aRctl e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: Weaken (Light)}, or @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.2sXIFIXiWxRHt8CP e:eos i:1 t:source]{Effect: Weaken (Poison)}

[All NPC Spells].name: [All NPC Spells]
[All NPC Spells].description:
Spells marked with ( @ICON[offensive] ) are offensive spells and require Magic Checks!
